function.name: windDirection_setValue
function.description: This function is used to adjust the wind direction on SmartThings devices like fans and air conditioners.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the wind direction.

mode.description: The mode to set for the wind direction (e.g., fixed, up, down, left, right).

windAngle.description: The angle at which to set the wind direction.
